subject: fix(import): handle multiple existing nodes with same title in merge
body:
The merge service used Map<string, GraphNode> for title-based matching,
which silently dropped all but the last existing node when multiple shared
a title (e.g., "Apple" [Company] vs "Apple" [Fruit]). Imported "Apple"
would match whichever was stored last, ignoring labels entirely.

Now uses Map<string, GraphNode[]> and ranks candidates by label overlap:
exact label match first, then most shared labels, then first candidate
as fallback. Each imported node independently picks its best match.

Tags: import, merge, deduplication
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: medium
Debt: paid
Epic: import-compatibility
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_01GmBxqTbwGYpy2GUF4TGDLk
title: handle multiple existing nodes with same title in merge
